title: Illaoi's E and Poison effects
body:
Can we take a moment to talk about how poison (or any other DoT for that matter) affects the duration of Illaoi's E? I like playing Illaoi and it gets extremely frustrating when, for example, Singed's poison literally burns through my E's duration just because I touched it slightly. Example:

> Enemies standing in the cloud's trail are poisoned for 2 seconds, taking magic damage every 0.25 seconds for the duration

...which means that a single instance of his poison will reduce Illaoi's E duration by **8 seconds** in just 2 seconds.

Basically, every time the target of Illaoi's E hits Illaoi, the duration of her E (active spirit on the field) decreases by 1 second. Same applies to DoT effects, which make it impossible for your E to survive for more than 2 seconds at best. 

Can we do something about that? Can we make it so that DoT effects don't have as much power at decreasing her E's duration? I know she's not the most popular champion at the moment, but this would at least be a nice buff for her without messing with her numbers at all.

Or like urgots ultimate.

It has an indicator.
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=-o2aNFx47y4

That circle at the feet of the soul with the segments, that's it. Each segment stands for 1 second duration left.
It was a quite elegant solution, it gives a clear feedback how many seconds are left and can still get updated for the reduction in duration for hits (each hit simply removes 1 segment).

Indicators like Yasuos or Urgot's wouldn't give that detailed information. These just really make sense if the duration is set and doesn't change.
